author: Eric White
title: It costs less than 75 euros and will make you forget about the cold at home: this folding infrared heater is at the best price today
text:
To stop the cold at home, there are many solutions, such as bioethanol fireplaces or pellet stoves. Although, in Leroy Merlin there is a Comfort Slim infrared heater which, now, you can get at a very good price: 74.99 euros.
Folding infrared gas stove 4200W
*Some prices may have changed since the last review
Buy Comfort Slim infrared heater at the best price
For only 74.99 euros, with this infrared stove that has Leroy Merlin You can enjoy a warmer home in winter. A very competitive price with which you can forget about the cold of the winter season at least when you are at home.
It is a perfect solution to provide you with portable and totally efficient heat. This infrared gas stove features a maximum power of 4,200W and offers three different heating levels.
It has a piezoelectric type ignition, which facilitates quick and safe starting. Besides, his ceramic panel and protective grille They ensure uniform heat distribution and no risk of burns.
Its design is foldable and has swivel wheels and handles, so you can easily move it from one corner to another and store it in summer, for example. It incorporates an anti-tip and auto-shutoff safety switch and offers heat for rooms of up to 40 square meters . Finally, note that it is compatible with butane/propane gas.
